title: County to County, Kent County edition: Dante Chinni and Allison Sandza
description: Do moderate Republicans hold the key to Trump's impeachment and re-election? To gauge that, Meet The Press assembled a group of six conflicted Republicans in Kent County, Michigan.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
